sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState, useRef } from "react"; import { useReactToPrint } from "react-to-print"; import CustomizedPrint from "../../atoms/CustomizedPrint/CustomizedPrint"; import { ToWords } from 'to-words'; import '../../../style/style.css'; const InvoiceFormat = ({ invoiceFormData, custrefno, invoiceno, api }) => { const [listofinvoices, setlistofinvoices] = useState([]); const [tabledata, setTabledata] = React.useState({}); const [constantinvoicedata, setconstantinvoicedata] = useState(); const [changinginvoicedata, setchanginginvoicedata] = useState(); const [totalamount, settotalamount] = useState(); const [totalinwords,settotalinwords] = useState(); const componentRef = useRef(); const handlePrint = useReactToPrint({ content: () => componentRef.current, // pageStyle }); const toWords = new ToWords(); useEffect(() => { if (invoiceFormData) { const tempdata = [...new Set(invoiceFormData.map((e) => e.customer_reference_no))]; tempdata.map((temp) => { let filterByTempData = invoiceFormData.filter(dataObject => dataObject.customer_reference_no === temp) var fixedstrings = filterByTempData[0]; setconstantinvoicedata(fixedstrings); let temptotal = 0; invoiceFormData.map((data)=>temptotal = temptotal + data.final_amount); settotalamount(temptotal); let words = toWords.convert(temptotal); settotalinwords(words); }) } }, [invoiceFormData]) useEffect(() => { api.get('delivery/fetchinvoicesfromdeliverytable') .then((res)=>{ setlistofinvoices(res.data); }) }, []) useEffect(() => { api.post('jointables/downloadinvoicedisplayedastable',{ params:{ invoice_no: invoiceno, customer_reference_no: custrefno } }) .then((res)=>{ setTabledata(res.data); }) }, []) const headers = [ { label: 'customer reference no', key: 'customer_reference_no' }, { label: 'booked date', key: 'booked_date' }, { label: 'requested delivery date', key: 'requested_delivery_date' }, { label: 'delivery date', key: 'delivery_date' }, { label: 'invoice no', key: 'invoice_no' }, { label: 'customer address', key: 'customer_address' }, { label: 'gst', key: 'gst' }, { label: 'phone number', key: 'phone_number' }, { label: 'product hsn code', key: 'product_hsn_code' }, { label: 'product', key: 'product' }, { label: 'quantity', key: 'quantity' }, { label: 'rate', key: 'rate' }, { label: 'discount', key: 'discount' }, { label: 'cgst', key: 'cgst' }, { label: 'sgst', key: 'sgst' }, { label: 'igst', key: 'igst' }, { label: 'final amount', key: 'final_amount' }, { label: 'balance amount', key: 'balance_amount' }, { label: 'payment status', key: 'payment_status' }, { label: 'booking advance amount', key: 'booking_advance_amount' }, { label: 'delivery status', key: 'delivery_status' }, { label: 'customer name', key: 'customer_name' }, ]; const csvReport = { filename: 'DeliveryReports.csv', headers: headers, data: tabledata } return (
{ constantinvoicedata ?
{ invoiceFormData && invoiceFormData.length && invoiceFormData.map((d, index)=>( )) }
TAX INVOICE
SHREE PARAMANANDA ENTERPRISES

Shop #05,Medhini Arcade,Kithaganahalli Gate,Opp Anna Building,Hosur Main Road Bangalore-560099,Mobile: 9035757145/9902880851/9141070705

Email ID:shreeparamananda@gmail.com

GSTIN/UIN:29AYSPB6397D1ZX,Karnataka State Code:29
Buyer: {constantinvoicedata.customer_address} Invoice No: {constantinvoicedata.invoice_no}
Date of supply:- {constantinvoicedata.delivery_date != null ? constantinvoicedata.delivery_date = constantinvoicedata.delivery_date.substring(0, 10) : constantinvoicedata.delivery_date = constantinvoicedata.delivery_date }
PO no: {constantinvoicedata.po_number}
GSTIN/UIN: {constantinvoicedata.gst} Vehicle No: {constantinvoicedata.vehicle_number}
State Code: {constantinvoicedata.state_code} Pan Number: {constantinvoicedata.pan_number}
Place of supply : {constantinvoicedata.state}
Contact NO : {constantinvoicedata.phone_number} {constantinvoicedata.phone_number} {constantinvoicedata.phone_number}
Sl Discription of Product HSN CODE Qty Rate Amount CGST SGST IGST Discount
{index+1} {d.product} {d.product_hsn_code} {d.quantity} {d.rate} {d.final_amount} {d.cgst} {d.sgst} {d.igst} {d.discount}
Total {totalamount}
Terms &Conditions :
  1. Payment only by DD/CHQ,In faver of Shree Paramananda Enterprises
  2. In Case of Cash payment contact the above phone number Before Making Payment
  3. Goods once sold Cannot return Back
Round off: {Math.round(totalamount)}
TOTAL: {Math.round(totalamount)}
Final Payble Amount :- {Math.round(totalamount)}
Amount in Words: Rupees {totalinwords} Only
Received The goods in good condition certified that the particulars given above are true and correct For Shree Paramananda Enterprises
Receivers Signature: Authorised Signatory:
: <> }
); } export default InvoiceFormat;
